name: ordinariness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being different or special or unexpected in any way: She expected him to act like a star, but she was surprised at his ordinariness. the dull ordinariness of her life See
ordinary
More examplesFewer examplesIt was not an unusual face, but its very ordinariness moved him.She was grateful for the sheer ordinariness of it all. It is her ordinariness that makes her achievements all the more outstanding.
